languages.text: Работники грузовой магистрали учатся и применяют знания на благо корабля. Их стараниями налажена логистика с инженерными отсеками, что открыло широкие возможности для улучшения прочности корабля.

traits.locale_text: Работники грузовой магистрали учатся и применяют знания на благо корабля. Их стараниями налажена логистика с инженерными отсеками, что открыло широкие возможности для улучшения прочности корабля.

languages.text: The freight line workers study to the best of their ability, applying newly attained knowledge for the betterment of the ship. Thanks to their efforts, logistical operations with the engineering bays have become more efficient, which has opened up new opportunities for fortifying the ship's hull.
languages.original_text: Работники грузовой магистрали учатся и применяют знания на благо корабля. Их стараниями налажена логистика с инженерными отсеками, что открыло широкие возможности для улучшения прочности корабля.

traits.locale_text: The freight line workers study to the best of their ability, applying newly attained knowledge for the betterment of the ship. Thanks to their efforts, the engineering logistics have become more efficient, which has opened up new opportunities for fortifying the ship's hull.

The freight line workers study to the best of their ability, applying newly attained knowledge for the betterment of the ship. Thanks to their efforts, logistical operations with the engineering bays have become more efficient, which has opened up new opportunities for fortifying the ship's hull.

languages.text: Los trabajadores de la línea de carga se esfuerzan al máximo en sus estudios y aplican sus nuevos conocimientos para mejorar la nave. Gracias a su abnegación, las operaciones logísticas en conjunción con los sectores de ingeniería se han vuelto más eficientes, lo que a su vez ha brindado nuevas oportunidades para reforzar el casco de la nave.
languages.original_text: The freight line workers study to the best of their ability, applying newly attained knowledge for the betterment of the ship. Thanks to their efforts, logistical operations with the engineering bays have become more efficient, which has opened up new opportunities for fortifying the ship's hull.

traits.locale_text: Los trabajadores de la línea de carga se esfuerzan al máximo en sus estudios y aplican sus nuevos conocimientos para mejorar la nave. Gracias a su abnegación, las operaciones logísticas en conjunción con los sectores de ingeniería se han vuelto más eficientes, lo que a su vez ha brindado nuevas oportunidades para reforzar el casco de la nave.

languages.text: 貨物ラインの作業員たちは、自分の能力を最大限に発揮するために勉強を続け、そこで得た知識を船の改良に生かしている。彼らの努力のおかげで、機関区との物流業務が効率化され、船体の新たな可能性が広がっている。
languages.original_text: The freight line workers study to the best of their ability, applying newly attained knowledge for the betterment of the ship. Thanks to their efforts, logistical operations with the engineering bays have become more efficient, which has opened up new opportunities for fortifying the ship's hull.

traits.locale_text: 貨物ラインの作業員たちは、自分の能力を最大限に発揮するために勉強を続け、そこで得た知識を船の改良に生かしている。彼らの努力のおかげで、機関区との物流業務が効率化され、船体の新たな可能性が広がっている。

languages.text: 货运区域的工人尽其所能地努力学习，运用新学到的知识改善船上的环境。由于这些工人的不懈努力，工程甲板的后勤效率变得越来越高，这也为优化舰体结构创造了新的机会。
languages.original_text: The freight line workers study to the best of their ability, applying newly attained knowledge for the betterment of the ship. Thanks to their efforts, logistical operations with the engineering bays have become more efficient, which has opened up new opportunities for fortifying the ship's hull.

traits.locale_text: 货运区域的工人尽其所能地努力学习，运用新学到的知识改善船上的环境。由于这些工人的不懈努力，工程甲板的后勤效率变得越来越高，这也为优化舰体结构创造了新的机会。

languages.text: Die Arbeiter der Frachtroute lernen nach Kräften und setzen ihr neu gewonnenes Wissen ein, um das Schiff zu verbessern. Dank ihrer Bemühungen sind die logistischen Operationen mit den Maschinendecks nun effizienter, was neue Möglichkeiten für die Verstärkung der Außenhülle des Schiffs eröffnet.
languages.original_text: The freight line workers study to the best of their ability, applying newly attained knowledge for the betterment of the ship. Thanks to their efforts, logistical operations with the engineering bays have become more efficient, which has opened up new opportunities for fortifying the ship's hull.

traits.locale_text: Die Arbeiter der Frachtroute lernen nach Kräften und setzen ihr neu gewonnenes Wissen ein, um das Schiff zu verbessern. Dank ihrer Bemühungen sind die logistischen Operationen mit den Maschinendecks nun effizienter, was neue Möglichkeiten für die Verstärkung der Außenhülle des Schiffs eröffnet.

languages.text: Les ouvriers de la ligne de fret étudient avec le plus grand sérieux et mettent leurs nouvelles compétences au service de l'optimisation du vaisseau. Grâce à leurs efforts, les opérations logistiques en lien avec les baies d'ingénierie ont gagné en efficacité, ce qui ouvre de nouvelles portes pour fortifier la coque du croiseur stellaire.
languages.original_text: The freight line workers study to the best of their ability, applying newly attained knowledge for the betterment of the ship. Thanks to their efforts, logistical operations with the engineering bays have become more efficient, which has opened up new opportunities for fortifying the ship's hull.

traits.locale_text: Les ouvriers de la ligne de fret étudient avec le plus grand sérieux et mettent leurs nouvelles compétences au service de l'optimisation du vaisseau. Grâce à leurs efforts, les opérations logistiques en lien avec les baies d'ingénierie ont gagné en efficacité, ce qui ouvre de nouvelles portes pour fortifier la coque du croiseur stellaire.

languages.text: Yük hattı çalışanları, alanlarında ellerinden geldiğince araştırma yaparak yeni edindikleri bilgileri geminin yararı için kullanıyorlar. Çabaları sayesinde mühendislik bölmelerindeki lojistik faaliyetler daha verimli hâle geldi. Bu da geminin gövdesini kuvvetlendirmek için yeni fırsatlar doğurdu.
languages.original_text: The freight line workers study to the best of their ability, applying newly attained knowledge for the betterment of the ship. Thanks to their efforts, logistical operations with the engineering bays have become more efficient, which has opened up new opportunities for fortifying the ship's hull.
